home.title: Home - Personalized candles with audio messages
home.description: Discover UNIKCANDLE: unique candles with audio messages hidden in the wax. Personalize your candle with your voice, choose your scent, and create an unforgettable emotional experience. Made in France with recycled materials.
home.ogTitle: UNIKCANDLE - Candles with hidden audio messages
home.ogDescription: Create a unique experience: personalized candles that reveal your audio message as they melt. Eco-friendly and made in France.

concept.title: What if your candle could talk?
concept.intro1: At UNIKCANDLE, we believe that a candle can be much more than just a decorative object.
concept.intro2: It's a true vector of emotions, capable of conveying a message, evoking a memory, or simply bringing a smile.

imagine.title: Imagine an elegant scented candle‚Ä¶
imagine.subtitle: that holds an invisible treasure...
imagine.reveal: As the wax melts, an engraved medallion is revealed.
imagine.message: This medallion contains a unique audio message: your voice, your sweet words, your message, ...
imagine.listen: Simply bring your phone close to the medallion to listen to the secret.

personalize.title: Personalize your creation
personalize.description: Record your audio directly on our website, we'll take care of inserting it into the wax to keep the surprise until the candle is lit.

moment.title: Unique moment
moment.description: A unique sensory experience. Give the candle and let the magic happen. Once lit, your candle releases its sweet scent and your message is revealed as the wax melts. Get ready to experience and create a suspended moment.

howItWorks.title: How does it work?
howItWorks.subtitle: Light up the magic of your memories

1.title: Choose the theme of your candle to give

3.title: Bring your phone close to the candle and let the magic happen

whyChoose.title: Why choose

unique.title: Unique
unique.description: Each candle is custom-made, exclusively for you or for someone exceptional.

innovative.title: Innovative
innovative.description: Our audio technology enhances the experience and makes each creation unforgettable.

emotional.title: Emotional
emotional.description: A refined gift, carrying intimate emotions, for memories engraved with elegance.

whyChoose.cta: Give or treat yourself to a unique emotion

metadata.title: Our Products - Artisanal Custom Candles
metadata.description: Discover our collection of customizable artisanal candles with audio messages. Choose from our various categories, scents, and designs. French craftsmanship, recycled materials, unique AR experience.
metadata.keywords: buy custom candle, artisanal candle collection, customizable scented candle, candle catalog, French candles, eco-friendly candles shop
metadata.ogDescription: Explore our collection of customizable artisanal candles with integrated audio messages. Each candle is unique.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.subtitle: A question? A special project? We're here to help you create your unique candle.

hero.title: At
hero.description: Each flame reveals a unique story, each candle becomes a treasure of emotions and refinement.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description: We have created exceptional, custom candles that combine emotion, elegance, and sophistication. With UNIKCANDLE, illuminate your most precious moments with exclusive creations that blend craftsmanship, luxury, and innovation. One candle, one message, one unforgettable experience.

process.title: Our Process
process.description1: Each UNIKCANDLE candle is crafted like a work of art: our containers are selected from noble materials and worked with the greatest precision to reveal an elegant and timeless design. This process of excellence ensures that each creation is a rare and exclusive piece, designed to enhance your spaces.
process.description2: This artisanal process allows us to reduce waste while bringing a touch of authenticity to our creations.

commitment.title: Our Commitment
commitment.description: Our candles are designed and made in France, with noble materials and rare fragrances, carefully selected from the finest perfume houses. Each creation embodies artisanal excellence and offers an unparalleled olfactory, visual, and emotional experience.

footer.tagline: The candle that speaks, that lights, that moves.
